name: QC Pending DFM
query:
Select 
  qi.name as "QC No",
  qi.workflow_state,
  qi.reference_name as "MRN No",
  qi.report_date as "Date",
  qi.company as "Company",
  qi.item_name as "Item Name",
  qi.item_code as "Item Code",
 i.category as "Category",
  i.item_sub_group as "Item Sub Group",
  i.item_group as "Item Group",
  qi.acc_qty as "MRN Base Qty:Float:100",
  qi.batch_no as "Batch No",
   qi.status as "Status",
  qi.approved_quantity as "Approved Qty:Float:100",
  qi.rejected_qty as "Rejected Qty:Float:100",
  qi.inspected_by as "Inspected By",
  qi.remarks as "Remarks"
  from  `tabQuality Inspection` qi  ,`tabItem` i
 WHERE
 
    qi.workflow_state="Pending For Quality" and i.item_code = qi.item_code 
    and  qi.report_date >= %(from_date)s and  qi.report_date <= %(to_date)s and qi.company = %(company)s
